title: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when there are code changes that need to be built.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on any file or project.
3. Observe that the 'Build' action is always enabled, regardless of whether there are any code changes or not.
